component.name: SusOps
component.summary: SSH tunnelling and SOCKS5 proxy management

description.p: SusOps is a system tray application for managing SSH tunnels and SOCKS5 proxies via the susops-cli tool. It provides quick access to start, stop, and configure proxies, port forwards, and browser launch shortcuts â€” all from your desktop's notification area.

ul.li: Start / stop / restart the SOCKS5 proxy with one click
Add and remove SOCKS hosts, local and remote port forwards
Launch Chrome or Firefox pre-configured with the PAC proxy
Live status indicator showing whether the proxy is running
